  • Method Details

    • buildMagicNumberList

      public static List<MagicNumber> buildMagicNumberList(byte[] configData, List<String> zeroDepthErrorList, Map<String,List<String>> continuationErrorMap)
      Public method to parse a byte array representing the magic file into a list containing MagicNumber objects which are also nested with continuations as child MagicNumber instances.
      Parameters:
      configData - the byte[] representing the magic file
      zeroDepthErrorList - logs errors with zero depth entries
      continuationErrorMap - logs errors with continuations - these are entries with depths > 0
      Returns:
      a List.

    • buildMagicNumberList

      public static List<MagicNumber> buildMagicNumberList(byte[] configData, @Nullable List<String> zeroDepthErrorList, @Nullable Map<String,List<String>> continuationErrorMap, boolean swallowParseException)
      Public method to parse a byte array representing the magic file into a list containing MagicNumber objects which are also nested with continuations as child MagicNumber instances.
      Parameters:
      configData - the byte[] representing the magic file
      zeroDepthErrorList - logs errors with zero depth entries
      continuationErrorMap - logs errors with continuations - these are entries with depths > 0
      swallowParseException - boolean whether to swallow or propogate ParseExceptions that are IGNORABLE_DATATYPE_MSGS
      Returns:
      a List.

    • buildMagicNumber

      public static MagicNumber buildMagicNumber(String entry) throws ParseException
      Parses a magic number entry and prepares a magic number item
      Parameters:
      entry - line to parse
      Throws:
      ParseException

    • buildMagicNumber

      public static MagicNumber buildMagicNumber(String entry, boolean swallowParseException) throws ParseException
      Parses a magic number entry and prepares a magic number item
      Parameters:
      entry - line to parse
      swallowParseException - should we swallow Ignorable ParseException or bubble them up
      Throws:
      ParseException
